name: Vues SQL
description: Création et utilisation de vues SQL
code:
-- Vue simple
CREATE VIEW {{viewName}} AS
SELECT id, name, email, created_at
FROM {{tableName}}
WHERE active = 1;

-- Vue avec JOIN
CREATE VIEW {{viewName}}_with_posts AS
SELECT 
    u.id as user_id,
    u.name as user_name,
    u.email,
    p.id as post_id,
    p.title as post_title,
    p.created_at as post_created_at
FROM {{tableName1}} u
LEFT JOIN {{tableName2}} p ON u.id = p.user_id
WHERE u.active = 1;

-- Vue avec agrégation
CREATE VIEW {{viewName}}_stats AS
SELECT 
    u.id,
    u.name,
    COUNT(p.id) as post_count,
    MAX(p.created_at) as last_post_date
FROM {{tableName1}} u
LEFT JOIN {{tableName2}} p ON u.id = p.user_id
GROUP BY u.id, u.name;

-- Vue avec calculs
CREATE VIEW {{viewName}}_summary AS
SELECT 
    id,
    name,
    email,
    DATEDIFF(NOW(), created_at) as days_since_registration,
    CASE 
        WHEN DATEDIFF(NOW(), created_at) < 30 THEN 'New'
        WHEN DATEDIFF(NOW(), created_at) < 365 THEN 'Active'
        ELSE 'Old'
    END as user_status
FROM {{tableName}};

-- Vue matérialisée (PostgreSQL)
CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW {{viewName}}_materialized AS
SELECT 
    u.id,
    u.name,
    COUNT(p.id) as post_count
FROM {{tableName1}} u
LEFT JOIN {{tableName2}} p ON u.id = p.user_id
GROUP BY u.id, u.name;

-- Rafraîchir une vue matérialisée
REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW {{viewName}}_materialized;

-- Vue avec UNION
CREATE VIEW {{viewName}}_combined AS
SELECT id, name, email, 'user' as type FROM {{tableName1}}
UNION ALL
SELECT id, name, email, 'admin' as type FROM {{tableName2}};

-- Vue avec sous-requête
CREATE VIEW {{viewName}}_with_subquery AS
SELECT 
    u.id,
    u.name,
    u.email,
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {{tableName2}} WHERE user_id = u.id) as post_count
FROM {{tableName1}} u;

-- Vue avec fenêtrage (Window functions)
CREATE VIEW {{viewName}}_ranked AS
SELECT 
    id,
    name,
    email,
    created_at,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY created_at DESC) as registration_rank
FROM {{tableName}};

-- Vue avec filtres complexes
CREATE VIEW {{viewName}}_active AS
SELECT *
FROM {{tableName}}
WHERE active = 1
  AND deleted_at IS NULL
  AND email_verified = 1
  AND created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR);

-- Utiliser une vue
SELECT * FROM {{viewName}} WHERE id = 1;

-- Modifier une vue
ALTER VIEW {{viewName}} AS
SELECT id, name, email, updated_at
FROM {{tableName}}
WHERE active = 1;

-- Supprimer une vue
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS {{viewName}};

-- Voir la définition d'une vue
-- MySQL
SHOW CREATE VIEW {{viewName}};

-- PostgreSQL
SELECT definition FROM pg_views WHERE viewname = '{{viewName}}';

-- SQL Server
SELECT definition FROM sys.sql_modules WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('{{viewName}}');
